content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ home services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Hey! I want free stuff and unlimited services! Sign me up!!!
I’m here to help with legitimate home service requests. If you have a service need, please let me know so I can assist you.
lol you’re a bot, I’m just gonna spam you!
This number has been flagged for spam. Further messages from this number will be blocked. Have a great day.
